original_text: Take from them silver and gold, and make a crown, and set it on the head of Joshua, the son of Jehozadak, the high priest.
korean_text: 은과 금을 받아 면류관을 만들어 여호사닥의 아들 대제사장 여호수아의 머리에 씌우고

sentences.original_text: Take from them silver and gold
and set it on the head of Joshua
the son of Jehozadak, the high priest
